title: Abel Gance: yesterday and tomorrow = Abel Gance: hier et demain
creator_credit: R. Picon-Borel, N. Kaplan, D Harispe, Q. Ciarlo, Nelly Kaplan and Office de Documentation par Film
brief_description: Yesterday and Tomorrow is a French/English dubbed documentary which summarizes Abel Gance’s entire career, from his days working initially as an actor in the film industry, up until 1963, the year this program was made. The documentary shows excerpts of his films including shorts like “La Folie du Docteur Tube” (1915). It is narrated through “the words of Gance”, who explains how his career was plagued with tragedy and little recognition.
